title: Great Fair Given at the City Assembly Rooms, New York, December 1861, in Aid of City Poor, from Harper's Weekly, December 28, 1861, pp. 824-825.
medium: Wood engraving in black ink on newsprint paper.
description: Horizontal view of the interior of a large hall with booths displaying merchandise set up all around it (a numbered booth in lower right foreground) and groups of men and women moving about it.
name: Print
